alert.note: Alert for Kenosha; Racine; Walworth (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 20 at 4:14PM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Walworth, southwestern Racine and western Kenosha Counties through 445 PM CDT... At 414 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Bohners Lake to Sharon. Movement was east- southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Elkhorn, Delavan, Lake Geneva, Paddock Lake, Williams Bay, Camp Lake, Twin Lakes, Wheatland, Genoa City, Walworth, Silver Lake, Fontana-On-Geneva Lake, Darien, Powers Lake, Bohners Lake, Como, Pell Lake, Salem, Burlington and Springfield. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
